name: Island Hopper (Maxwell Clarke (maxeonyx))
description:
Our entry for Kiwijam 2020! Collect items and build a raft to travel to higher and higher islands.

  • Grace Huang - Programming
  • Nick Redpath - 3D Modelling & Textures
  • Nikki Campbell - 3D Modelling & Animation
  • Jonathan Brown - UI, Music & Sound Effects
  • Maxwell Clarke - Programming

The theme for the jam was "On the brink".

New Zealand, 2099. Extreme climate change has brought the world to the brink of collapse. As the acidic oceans continue to rise, a few remaining survivors migrate between the tropical islands of the Southern Alps Archipelago.

Terrain based on real heightmaps of the Mount Cook area!
